collection_holder_name: Noel Memorial Library, Northwest Louisiana Archives at LSUS
pageContext.collection_title: Paul L. Carriger Correspondence and Records, 1928-1975
pageContext.collection_description: Letters and cards from thirty-seven (37) states, Canada and Puerto Rico acknowledging reception of radio stations, W5XA and KWEA. The collection contains photographs, some broadcast news articles on "Paul the Radio Man," in the 1930s and some in the 1960s and a few items on KWKH and W. K. Henderson. It also includes correspondence, photographs and new articles on the Experimental Television Stations W9XX,W5XX and W5CBU. There are about 100 photographs of persons involved with the stations and views of the studio and equipment.
